desc: 50% boost to Rec, max HP, enormously boosts BB gauge each turn, considerably reduces BB gauge required for BB, hugely boosts OD gauge fill rate & activates BB gauge boost each turn effect at turn's start
lore:
A diminished shard of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire, this crystalline shard pulses with warm memories of friends from another world. Its odd name was contributed by a researcher fond of sentiment.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects, a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail, it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field, if only to better understand its powers.
name: Faded Heart
